basics.name: Thor Whalen
basics.label: AI & Data Leader
basics.summary: AI & Data Leader with 20+ years of experience transforming raw data into automation, insight, and action. Co-founder of OtoSense (acquired by Analog Devices) and former Director of Machine Learning at ADI. Expert Python developer with 150+ open-source packages. Hands-on builder with deep expertise in marketplace optimization, predictive maintenance & IoT, and high-volume services.

work.name: Figiri
work.summary: Building visualization and analytics tools for graph and embedding data.
highlights: Built data visualization tools for exploring LLM semantic spaces and customer journeys.
Designed agent-driven analytics pipelines for real-time decision support.

work.name: Addix Group
work.summary: Consulted on AI agent integration into core business workflows.
highlights: Delivered AI agent prototypes (resume-matching, no-code apps, contextual assistants).
Guided leadership on LLM adoption to reduce costs and accelerate insight-to-action cycles.

work.name: Analog Devices
work.summary: Led ML/data science team post-acquisition of OtoSense.
highlights: Scaled predictive maintenance workflows from IoT data ingestion to device-level deployment.
Built reusable pipelines tied to ROI and efficiency improvements.
Translated technical results into business impact for senior leadership.

work.name: OtoSense
work.summary: Founded AI startup for IoT sound/vibration recognition, acquired by Analog Devices.
highlights: Created IoT recognition systems for logistics and industrial use cases.
Introduced façade/adapters to unify heterogeneous edge deployments.
Reframed ML metrics into business-aligned KPIs (dollarized trade-offs of FP/FN).

work.name: TagCommander (Commanders Act)
work.summary: Developed data science and attribution models for high-volume marketing.
highlights: Built attribution models, real-time KPIs, and automated pipelines.
Delivered decision-support reporting that improved campaign efficiency.

work.name: Expedia
work.summary: Applied AI to large-scale SEM optimization for millions of hotel nights.
highlights: Aligned structured hotel/destination data with unstructured ad copy.
Optimized bids to balance ROI with revenue and nights sold; boosted KPIs and marketer productivity.

work.name: Independent Consultant (Methodic Solutions)
work.summary: Delivered AI/ML consulting across industries (media, e-commerce, healthcare, logistics).
highlights: Unified messy, siloed data into clean ecosystems.
Built reusable frameworks and taxonomies to accelerate data-to-value workflows.

publications.name: Scientific Publications
publications.summary: 15 peer-reviewed papers in graph theory, applied statistics, and data science.

publications.name: Other Publications
publications.summary: Occasional posts sharing insights on AI, data, and systems design.

projects.name: Key Open-Source Projects
projects.description: Creator of 150+ Python packages, including data infrastructure, AI agent frameworks, and visualization tools.
highlights: Data Infrastructure: dol, sqldol, mongodol, chromadol
